other_title: デュエル・マスターズVSRF (Japanese)
plot: The band-aid on Katta Kirifuda's forehead -- used to suppress his uncontrollable power -- has peeled off. There seems no adverse effect at first. Suddenly, Katta's pet hamster Hamkatsu starts talking, revealing a big secret.
opening_theme: "Subarashiki Sekai" (素晴らしきSekai ; Wonderful World) by Pile
